detectors.description: Crowdsale._deliverTokens(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#236-243) uses arbitrary from in transferFrom: token.transferFrom(tokenFrom,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#242)

Crowdsale.withdrawl() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#272-274) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(address(this).balance) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#273)

detectors.description: Crowdsale._deliverTokens(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#236-243) ignores return value by token.transferFrom(tokenFrom,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#242)

Control.setOwner(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#25-27) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = _owner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#26)

Crowdsale.setWeiRaiseLimit(uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#136-138) should emit an event for: 
	- weiRaiseLimit = _limit (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#137)

Crowdsale.adjustRate(uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#130-132) should emit an event for: 
	- rate = _rate (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#131)

Control.setOwner(address)._owner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#25) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _owner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#26)

Crowdsale.constructor(uint256,Share,ERC20Token,address,uint256)._tokenFrom (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#166) lacks a zero-check on :
		- tokenFrom = _tokenFrom (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#177)

Crowdsale.setTokenFrom(address)._from (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#115) lacks a zero-check on :
		- tokenFrom = _from (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff1667bddc9b832a0022bbfc6c586bd299262d94_Crowdsale.sol#116)
